title: Return to Botany Bay
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, David Ferris and Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch
brief_description: Intersperses 1987 documentary footage of the re-enactment of the voyage of the First Fleet with Trevor Lunn interviewing an Australia Post representative discussing their role in the Bi-centennial re-enactment and production of the commemorative stamp series.
creator_credit_for_label: Jeff Spencer, David Ferris and Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch
